steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"6b2hd","text":"Dissect the tissue with clean tools,   preferably, and as quickly as possible to prevent degradation by proteases.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":37,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1bnmd","text":"    ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e8hip","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"crfbo","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3qc0e","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":165}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":10,"offset":0,"style":"italic"}],"key":"769op","text":"Striatum: ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"length":1,"offset":78},{"key":1,"length":1,"offset":149},{"key":2,"length":1,"offset":246},{"key":3,"length":1,"offset":298}],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"7a29t","text":"Using cold cutting solution, cut brain slices coronally with the vibratome in    steps until reaching the striatum, and then change the thickness to   to cover the whole striatum in one slice. Move the slice to a Petri dish with cutting solution  . Under the scope (keep the tray of the scope also   ), use the scalpel and the forceps to dissect the striatum or its subregions.","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"1kemj","text":"","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{"0":{"data":{"error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":202,"value":"240"},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"thickness"},"1":{"data":{"error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":202,"value":"500-600"},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"thickness"},"2":{"data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":165},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"temperature"},"3":{"data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":165},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"temperature"}}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a5d55","text":"Loading and running:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"14tat","text":"Load equal and appropriate amounts of protein into the wells of the SDS-PAGE gel, along with molecular weight marker.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3jocl","text":" Run the gel for 1–2 h at 100 V (the time and voltage may require optimization, check the marker to obtain an optimal separation of the bands with the target molecular weight).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"690al","text":"Equilibrate gel and membrane in transfer buffer (membrane can be nitrocellulose or PVDF, previosuly activated with methanol for 1 min and rinsed in transfer buffer)    . ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c4ml3","text":"Assemble gel and membrane sandwich: place gel and membrane between buffer-soaked filter papers and sponges. Gently remove air bubbles.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"822ok","text":"Perform transfer: place transfer assemble in transfer cell and fill with buffer. The time and voltage of transfer require some optimization.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4qsdd","text":"Block the membrane for   at   or   overnight at   using blocking buffer ( in TBS-T 0.1% Tween).","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":23,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":28,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":48,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":73,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9ooqr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}},"3":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"5","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"milk","scientificNotation":false,"unit":14}}}}
